install_msg:
Usage: `[p]help clocks`
**NOTE:** This cog is mainly used for Forged in the Dark tabletop RPGs.
It will likely make no sense outside of this context.
name: Clocks
description: Track projects with clocks. Mainly used for Forged in the Dark tabletop RPGs.
